title: Experiential Simulation Learning to Strengthen Humanitarian Supply Chain Collaboration Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: No foundational knowledge of supply chain management or instructional design
context.additional_context: Humanitarian cooperation education linked to language curricula for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Describing at least three cases of information distortion occurring in humanitarian supply chains
Practicing collaborative decision-making processes three or more times in simulation environments and proposing improvement strategies
Developing at least one field-applicable educational scenario based on experiential learning outcomes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
